meta.hint: A suffix can be added to the end of a word. It  changes the meaning of the word. The suffix -able means able to be. Payable means able to be paid. The suffix -ment means the action or result of. Payment means the action or result of paying.
meta.question: Select the correct meaning of the  word with suffix -able and -ment.

content.description:
What does the word mean?
Enjoyable
content.extra: the action of enjoying, able to be enjoyed

content.description:
What does the word mean?
Shipment
content.extra: the result of shipping, able to be shipped

content.description:
What does the word mean?
Statement
content.extra: able to be stated, the result of stating

content.description:
What does the word mean?
Changeable
content.extra: the action of changing,  able to be changed

content.description:
What does the word mean?
Agreement
content.extra: able to be agreed,  the result of agreement
